jobDescription:
Senior Full Stack Developer - TechCorp Inc.

We are seeking an experienced Senior Full Stack Developer to join our innovative engineering team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web applications using modern technologies.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain full-stack web applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript
• Design and implement RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
• Work with databases including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and DevOps
• Implement automated testing strategies and CI/CD pipelines
• Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
• Optimize application performance and ensure scalability
• Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry best practices

Required Qualifications:
• 5+ years of experience in full-stack development
• Strong proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Node.js
• Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
• Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
• Experience with version control systems (Git) and agile methodologies
• Strong understanding of database design and optimization
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with GraphQL and Apollo
• Knowledge of machine learning frameworks
• Contributions to open-source projects
• Experience with mobile development (React Native)
• AWS certifications
• Experience leading technical projects

Benefits:
• Competitive salary and equity package
• Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
• Flexible work arrangements and remote work options
• Professional development budget
• Annual company retreats
• State-of-the-art equipment and workspace

resumeData.name: Alexandra Chen
resumeData.experience:
Senior Software Engineer | Microsoft | Seattle, WA | 2021 - Present
• Led development of cloud-native microservices using Node.js and TypeScript, serving 10M+ users daily
• Architected and implemented GraphQL APIs that reduced data transfer by 40% and improved mobile app performance
• Mentored 5 junior developers and established code review processes that decreased bug reports by 35%
• Collaborated with product teams to deliver 15+ features using agile methodologies and CI/CD pipelines
• Optimized database queries and implemented Redis caching, reducing API response times by 60%

Full Stack Developer | Startup Inc. | San Francisco, CA | 2019 - 2021
• Built responsive web applications using React, Redux, and Material-UI for 500K+ active users
• Developed RESTful APIs with Express.js and integrated with PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases
• Implemented automated testing with Jest and Cypress, achieving 90% code coverage
• Deployed applications on AWS using Docker containers and managed infrastructure with Terraform
• Worked directly with founders to define technical requirements and product roadmap

Software Developer | TechStart Solutions | Austin, TX | 2017 - 2019
• Developed e-commerce platforms using React and Node.js, processing $2M+ in monthly transactions
• Integrated third-party payment systems (Stripe, PayPal) and implemented fraud detection algorithms
• Created data visualization dashboards using D3.js and Chart.js for business analytics
• Participated in agile development cycles and maintained 99.9% application uptime
